name: Super Diego Adventure
description:
Dont you hate it when racoons steal your chips?

Jump infinitely to platform through a buncha hard levels in order to get Super Diego's chips back!

please note: this game was made in scratch meaning its not as polished as other games

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

1: download game

2: unzip file

3: go to turbowarp.org

4: click on files and then click on Load from my computer

5: select the file and game

6: enjoy!!
